segments.text: Do you have some good ideas of losing weight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First of all , you should pay attention to what you eat . Don't eat too much food with high calories , such as chocolate , ice cream and the like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Stay away from fried foods . Fried foods are fried in oil or fat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do not be a couch potato . You should do more exercise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it seems that I should do some jogging from tomorrow on .
segments.speaker: S1
